For other uses, see Academica.
Academica Corp.
Founded 1999; 19 years ago (1999)
Headquarters Miami, Florida
Number of locations
 72 (2013)
Area served
 Florida
Website www.academica.org

Academica is an education management organization headquartered in Miami, Florida. As of January, 2013 it operated seventy-two charter schools in Florida.[1] [2]

Contents

  • 1 Schools
    • 1.1 California
    • 1.2 Florida
    • 1.3 Nevada
    • 1.4 Texas
    • 1.5 Utah
  • 2 References
